# cds-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description             | Type                             | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ----------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`   | Switch is checked       | `boolean`                        | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | Switch is disabled      | `boolean`                        | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`      | Name                    | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `outlined` | `outlined`  | Is outlined             | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`      | Size                    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
| `switchId` | `switch-id` | Unique id of the switch | `string`                         | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event             | Description                                       | Type               |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `cdsSwitchChange` | cdsSwitchChange event, contains change from input | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `selectSwitch`    | Switch is triggered                               | `CustomEvent<any>` |

| Slot | Description |
| ---- | ----------- |
|      | Content     |
